bibliography:

周易集解 (A Collection of Explanations on
the Changes of Zhou Dynasty), Beijing:
Zhongguo shudian.

New Translation of the I Ching as Interpreted
by Wang Bi, (Translations from the Asian Classics), New York:
Columbia University Press.

Redmond, Geoffrey (trans.), 2017, The I
Ching (Book of Changes): A Critical Translation of the Ancient

jiaoshi 王弼集校釋 (A
Collection of Writings by Wang Bi, Annotated and Explicated), Lou

[WB] 1950 [1961], The I Ching or Book of Changes: The Richard
Wilhelm translation rendered into English, 2 volumes, (Bollingen

Books. Page numbers are from the one volume, second edition,
Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1961.
